attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britian has become a place where the British are treated as second class citizens. Christians as a whole are losing their rights due to politicaly correct moorons. This is Britian and we should not allow these people to ruin this country anymore. They say that this is what the British want but when do they ask us what we want!

rejection.details: Please change the main sentence from "Alex Lowe" to a clear action for HM Government.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
